text: Bruce Cabot (April 20, 1904 â€“ May 3, 1972) was an American movie actor. He played Jack Driscoll in the original King Kong (1933). He was married three times. He was friends with Errol Flynn and John Wayne. He appeared in many of Wayne's movies. He died in 1972 in California from cancer. == References == ==Other websites== * * * Category:1904 births Category:1972 deaths Category:Actors who played in James Bond movies Category:American movie actors Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles
